alert.note: Alert for Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 1:33PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Starr County through 200 PM CDT... At 132 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Los Alvarez, or near La Rosita, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rio Grande City, Escobares, La Rosita, Starr County Memorial Hospital, Ringgold Middle School, Los Alvarez, Fort Ringgold County Park, Garceno, Starr County Sheriffs Office and Rio Grande City Municipal Airport. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 812 and 822. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
